tradestock.view.textfieldview

Interface WithTextField

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddStock, BuyStockMoney, BuyStockView, CheckCostByDateView, CheckCostView, CheckValueByDateView, CheckValueView, CreatePortfolio, CreateStrategyInputStrategyBasic, DiffPercentageEndBasic, DiffPercentageNoEndBasic, EqualPercentageNoEndBasic, GetPortfolioDetailByDateView, GetPortfolioDetailView, SetCommissionFee, UseDiffPercentageEnd, UseDiffPercentageNoEnd, UseEqualPercentageEnd, UseEqualsPercentage

    public interface WithTextField
    This interface represents Views that with text field in them. It has void addActionListener to add a listener to button, String getInput() to get the content of text field that user typed, void setHintMess(String message) that take a given a message, and show it on the view, void clearField() that clear the text field, void resetFocus() to reset focus.

      Reset focus.
